name: ROLEX Model

filtrationStages.Copper Filter: Adds health benefits and antimicrobial properties.

benefits: Comprehensive Purification: Combining RO, UV, and UF technologies ensures the removal of a wide range of contaminants, including dissolved salts, microorganisms, and particulate matter.
Health Benefits: The inclusion of a copper filter adds essential minerals and has antimicrobial properties, enhancing the health benefits of the purified water.
TDS Control: The TDS controller ensures that essential minerals are retained in the water, providing balanced and healthy drinking water.
Quality Assurance: ISO certification and quality testing guarantee the reliability and safety of the water purifier.
Convenience: Water level indicators and purification process indicators make it easy to monitor the system's status and ensure efficient operation.
description: This ROLEX model water purifier is designed to provide high-quality, safe drinking water, making it suitable for domestic use. It ensures comprehensive purification, retains essential minerals, and offers additional health benefits through copper filtration.
